name: Japanese-Style Crab Fried Brown Rice
author: Jane
summary: My crab fried rice, Japanese style.
ingredients: 2  green onions, diced, white parts only
directions: Bring water and brown rice to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender and liquid has been absorbed, 45 to 50 minutes
While rice is cooking, heat a skillet over medium heat
Add green onions and garlic and cook for 1 minute
Add mushrooms and cook until softened, 3 to 5 minutes
Add carrots and cook until softened, about 2 minutes more
Add crab and cook until heated through, about 3 minutes more
Mix soy sauce, maple syrup, and sesame oil to the vegetable mixture in the skillet
Add cooked rice and stir to combine
